message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.SE

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): EPIC proposes a unified framework to combine different hotspot detection methods, which may involve parallel computing.
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): EPIC uses pattern matching as one of the hotspot detection methods.
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): EPIC also uses machine learning as one of the hotspot detection methods.
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing): EPIC may involve neural networks as part of the machine learning method.
- cs.SE (Software Engineering): EPIC is a software tool for physical verification and physical design in IC manufacturing.
